participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easy-going, enjoys casual conversations and has a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a suburban area, has a degree in communications, and works in a marketing firm.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Confident and laid-back, often speaks with a relaxed tone and enjoys banter.
participant_2.background: Originally from a coastal town, he has a background in business and loves outdoor activities.
